channel.title: Researcher | Academician | Software Engineer on Amit Seal Ami
channel.description: Recent content in Researcher | Academician | Software Engineer on Amit Seal Ami

item.title: Affiliations / Activities
item.description: Due to previous achievements in different types of competitions and communities, as well as considering my current position - I am frequently invited to mentor, judge and speak at various events. Some of these are: 2016 Mentor and Judge, National Hackathon Mentor, Smart City Hackathon Panel Speaker at Facebook’s F8 Meetup at Bangladesh Speaker at International Women’s Day Celebration - by IEEE AIUB Student Branch and Google Women Techmakers Bangladesh Judge, EATL-Prothom Alo App contest 2015 Moderator, IEEE Pro-Talk 2015 Technical Session on Mobile Apps Lifecycle and Ecosystem at EATL- Prothom Alo App Contest 2015 Bootcamp

item.title: Research & Publications
item.description: 2017 MobileMonkey - A Contextual Stress Testing Framework for Android Application; Rayhanur Rahman, Amit Seal Ami, Kazi Sakib; International Journal of Computer Applications; Funded by Innovation Fund, ICT Division, Bangladesh. Modeling Software Defects as Anomalies: A Case Study on Promise Repository; Kamrun Nahar Neela, Syed Ali Asif, Amit Seal Ami, Alim Ul Gias; Journal of Software 2016 A Static Code Search Technique to Identify Dead Fields by Analyzing Usage of Setup Fields and Field Dependency in Test Code; Abdus Satter, Amit Seal Ami, Kazi Sakib; CDUD@ CLA 2015 Selecting best attributes for software defect prediction; Prianka Mandal, Amit Seal Ami; 2015 IEEE International WIE Conference on Electrical and Computer Engineering (WIECON-ECE) A Content Assist based Approach for Providing Rationale of Method Change for Object Oriented Programming, Amit Seal Ami, Shariful Islam, International Journal of Information Engineering and Electronic Business (IJIEEB), funded by ICT Fellowship #2014

item.title: Associations
item.description: I am frequently invited as Judge, Speaker and Mentor at various events due to my previous achievements as participants and contributions in similar events. Some of these are: 2017 Seminar Speaker at Application Life Cycle Management (ALM), BASIS SoftExpo Mentor and Judge, Daffodil International University App Contest 2016 Mentor and Judge, National Hackathon Mentor, Smart City Hackathon Panel Speaker at Facebook’s F8 Meetup at Bangladesh Speaker at International Women’s Day Celebration - by IEEE AIUB Student Branch and Google Women Techmakers Bangladesh Judge, EATL-Prothom Alo App contest 2015 Moderator, IEEE Pro-Talk Technical Session on Mobile Apps Lifecycle and Ecosystem at EATL- Prothom Alo App Contest 2015 Bootcamp

item.title: Administration / Committees
item.description: As part of administration / committees - I made several contributions both individually and in group for Institute of Information Technology (IIT), University of Dhaka. Some of these are: 4th Year Committee / Intern Placement Office As member of the 4th Year Management Committee and Intern Placement office, I contributed in: Defining the guideline of SE 801. Evening Program Management Committee (EPMO) As PGDIT Coordinator, I was a member of EPMO from year 2015-16.

item.title: Courses
item.description: I lectured on the following courses at Institute of Information Technology, University of Dhaka: CSE 401: Operating System CSE 501: Parallel Computing CSE 502: Web Technology SE 506: Design Patterns BUS 602: Management Information Systems SE 843: Software Metrics MSSE 1044: Software Analytics PGD 202: Object Oriented Programming PGD 207: Mobile Application MITM413: Strategic Management
